titles.title: To provide for continued operation of the Federal Aviation Administration in the event of a lapse in appropriation.
To provide for continued operation of the Federal Aviation Administration in the event of a lapse in appropriation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary: This bill provides appropriations for the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) if there is a lapse in appropriations for the FAA. Specifically, the bill provides the appropriations that are necessary for the operation of the FAA for the lesser of (1) 30 days, or (2) the duration of the lapse in appropriations.
